EmailTemplate.name: PAM Approval
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for notifying approvers when they need to approve a request changes a user's permissions on a PAM container.. Note that in addition to the declared arguments, all workflow variables, Step arguments, and Approval arguments defined in the Workflow are also available.

Argument.name: workflow
Argument.Description: The Workflow object being executed.

Argument.name: item
Argument.Description: The WorkItem representing the review.

Argument.name: pamRequest
Argument.Description: The PAMRequestDTO with information about the request.

Argument.name: launcher
Argument.Description: The name of the Identity that launched the workflow.

Argument.name: identityName
Argument.Description: The name of the Identity that is being changed.

Argument.name: identityDisplayName
Argument.Description: The display name of the Identity that is being changed.

Argument.name: containerDisplayName
Argument.Description: The display name of the PAM container the user is having access modified on.

EmailTemplate.Subject: Changes requested for $identityDisplayName on container '$containerDisplayName' need approval
EmailTemplate.Body:
$launcher is requesting the following changes for $identityDisplayName on container '$containerDisplayName'.
#foreach ($acctReq in $pamRequest.accountRequests) Account: $acctReq.displayName #if ($acctReq.addedRightsCSV) Added rights: $acctReq.addedRightsCSV #end #if ($acctReq.removedRightsCSV) Removed rights: $acctReq.removedRightsCSV #end #end

EmailTemplate.name: PAM User Notification
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for notifying users when they are given access or removed to a PAM container. Note that in addition to the declared arguments, all workflow variables, Step arguments, and Approval arguments defined in the Workflow are also available.

Argument.name: workflow
Argument.Description: The Workflow object being executed.

Argument.name: launcher
Argument.Description: The name of the Identity that launched the workflow.

Argument.name: identityDisplayName
Argument.Description: The display name of the Identity that is being changed.

Argument.name: containerDisplayName
Argument.Description: The display name of the PAM container the user is having access modified on.

Argument.name: pamRequest
Argument.Description: The PAMRequestDTO with information about the request.

Argument.name: approverDisplayName
Argument.Description: The display name of the identity that approved this request, or null if the request did not require approval.

EmailTemplate.Subject: Your access to the container '$containerDisplayName' was modified
EmailTemplate.Body:
$launcher requested the following changes to your access on container '$containerDisplayName' and they were #if($pamRequest.isApproved())approved#{else}rejected#end#if($!approverDisplayName) by ${approverDisplayName}#end.
#foreach ($acctReq in $pamRequest.accountRequests) Account: $acctReq.displayName #if ($acctReq.addedRightsCSV) Added rights: $acctReq.addedRightsCSV #end #if ($acctReq.removedRightsCSV) Removed rights: $acctReq.removedRightsCSV #end #end
